dang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa gsum pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa bzhi de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po la gdul dka'
ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la//// tadu sh+'a/ shi ri shi ro/ da mi de mne/ da re de re ni/ sha re'i sho ra ni/ bad+d+hishA la/ bshA la/ pa sha pashani deban
d+han yo sna b+ha// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i gleng+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir
gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'ad 'don pa dang/ 'chong ba de 'jages pa thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ ya dogs ma rungs pa dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa 'o sogs
pha rol gyi dgra dang/ sdug bsngal mang pos gtses pa dang/ gza' dang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lngalta kyang rnam par grol te sa bzhi pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dang 'chen po la yon tan sna tshogs kyis bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o//gzungs la// tad+ya thA/ hari/ nyA rini/ tsa ri tsi ri ne/ karimAni/ sang
ka ri ma Ni/ san bA sa ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam+b+han/ mahan/ swa yam bu ka swA hA// gas kyi bu gzungs 'ad ne gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyad 'a sa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a bsrung ba'i phyire gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jiges pa thams cad dang/ gcan
gzan khro bo dang/ yi dgas ma rungs pa dang/ mi deng mam yanang la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang 2 sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang/ gza' dang/ sgrib pa rnam
pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa lnga pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa drug pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ yi shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgron ma/
zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la// tad+ya thA/ ba te ri bo to ri/ ma ni/ ka li ka la/ ba te han te lu lu lu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ to lu ba te lu ba/ tsha/
shad tsa pa ji sha sna ste/ sarba sa tAnAn/ sid rgyan du ma ma/ man trapa dAn sAhA////rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyad las 'das
zla pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa drug pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cingo'achangan/ 'jigs pa
thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ yi dgas ma rungs pa dang/ mi deng ni ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtsa ba dang/
y+Yo gza' dang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa drug pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sabadun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
la/ khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la// tad+yathA/ dza ha dza hA ru/ ha dza ha dza ha ra/ be'u lu ka/ be'u lu la a mr-i ta g+ha ni/ pu
ru shano/ ba ru taM ke/ ba ru bad to/ ba d+ha he ke/ bon da ba 'a no/ a gro lo te ke/ b+he'u tshu yu/ b+he'u tshu yu swA hA/ karigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ne gang+ga'i klung bdun
gyi bye ma snyad las 'das pa'i sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsrung ba'i khyor gsungs te/ susagazungs sngags 'di 'don
[4 ]cing 'amangan/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro pe dad yaM dgas ma rungs pa dang/ mdung ma me yon pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa
sna tshogs kyis gtsu ba dang/ gza' dang/ slobe pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa bdun pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa brgyad nga la gnas par byang
chub sems dung 'asems dang 'chen po la rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la// tad+ya thA/ sha re'i dra sho re ni mi dam te/ kAri
kAri/ ha ruhe ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ b+han d+ha ni swAhA////rigs kyi bu gzus 'di ni gang+gA'i klu brgyad kyi bye ma skad las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// sa
brgyad nga la gnas nga 'i byeng chub sems dang 'a bsrungapa'i phyore gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'changan/ 'jigs nga thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro ba dang/
ya dogs ma rungs pa dang/ mi dang mam yin pa la sogs ti/ pha rol gyi degra dang/ sdug bsngal rnam ba sna tshogs kyis gtsas ba dang/ gza'adang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las
kyang rnam par grol te/ sa brgyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa dgu pa lo gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po la sgo mtha' yes pa'i rgyun ces ]
bya@#// bya ba'i gzungs 'di skyo'o// gzungs la/// tad+ya thA/ ha ri tsan kha lo ke/ ku la mA d+ha te/ to ra sha/ pa ta pa ta sa/ sha re shA re ga sha
gi pi shi ri sA sarba sa t+tAnAn sAhA////rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyad las 'das pa 'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa dgu pa/
la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cinge 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ yi dgas
ma rungs pa dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs to/ pha rol gyi dgra dang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang/ gza' dang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par
grol te/ sa dgu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa bcupa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs
'di skye ste/ gzungs la// tad+ya thA/ sid d+ha su sidad+haM/ mo tsun mo lhan M , ]ba mug te/ a ma le/ ba me la/ da ma la/ mang ga le/ hi ri rgya gad+haM/
radanagaD+ha/ saman ta b+ha dra/ sarba an+nA sA d+hani/ mnA si/ mahAman si/ a b+hu te/ a tu b+hu te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a tsu te/ a mr-i ti/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bany+tsi/
0 brah+ma sA re/ pu ran/ pU ra na/ ma ne ra the/ pAhA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni bkra shis pa dang/ spyabo nas dbang bskur ba ste/ gang+gA'i klung nganu'i bye ma snyad las
'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don
'changan/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ ya degs ma rungs pa dang/ ma dang ma ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgradang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
tshogs kyis gtse ba dang/ gza'adang/ gdug pa can thams cad dang/ sgrib pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa las rnam par grol te/ sa bcu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po sang ga'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas/ btsem ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di deg bshad pa thos nas stan las langs
te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nasazhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'disaTastod do/
zab mo mtshan nyid mdachos la// skye bo shes pa nyams pa rnams// bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrola mdzad pas// dab mad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab/
[r ]@#// spyan/chos kyi mtshan nyid cig ma gzigs// yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis// kun tu gsal ba bsamami khyag/ res 'ga' 'ang skye ba med pa ste/
ShA'agog bar yang n me'agyur ro// de ltar mnyam par gzigs pan// bla med gnas su bzhugs par gyur// 'khor ba dag kyang ma 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la'ang ma bzhugs shing//
mtha' gnyis la ni mi gnas te// de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba brnyes// dag dang ma dag phyogs la yang// rnam par dbye ba mad pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ro gcig mkhyen pas na// rnam par
dag pa'i mchog bsdus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshad mad skus// tshig gcig ston pa med par yang// 'khor mang 'di dag thams cad la// chos kyi char gyis tshim par
mdzad// sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi// mtshan nyide rnam par gziges med kyang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad las// bcom ldan rtag tu skyob par mdzad//
ts+tsa bde dang sdug bsngal rtag mi rtag/ bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang// gcig dang tha dad ma yin dang// skye ba med dang 'gog med pa'i// de 'dra'i don gyi rnam pa la//
rnam par dbye zhing stong par mdzad// dper na brag r stong par na// de don sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen// tshes kyi dbyingesani dbyer med pas// theg pa mi mthun gzhan
mad de// sems can rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir// gsum du rnam par dbye ba mdzad// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag bgacug
du gzar nas/ pusam g.yasaba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbya rab btud nas/ com ldan 'das kyi zhabu la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dishin tudakon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar yang dgeb/ bar du yang dgeb/ tha mar yang dag ba/ don bzang ngo/
tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogasab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phunasum tshogs par mdzad pa 'di gong zhig 'chang ba dang/ 'dzin pa de sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa bzo ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gang
mdo 'di nyen par byed pa// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyire zhin/ rigs kyabu 'dis ni/ sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu sman par byed pa dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam ba yon ba dang/ mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir mnyan pa dang/ gzung
@#// ba dung/ klog pa dang/ gdon par bya'o// de yang rags kyi bu dag ba'i rtso ba ma bskyod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su ma smin pa dang/ sangs rgyas mang po la
bstan bkur ma byas pa'i sems can de dag gis ni dam pa'i tshes 'di mnyan bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ shes kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
dag lhag ba'i bsam pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/
[@ ]mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ma zad pa mon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bralabar 'gyur/ sems can gyibasam pa dang sbyod pa dang/ sgra la'ajug pa'i gzungs dang
mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang ma 'bral bor 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa 'grub
pa'i gzungs dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'iro rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'agazung
dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshig dang/ spyod pa dang/ sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang ma 'brel bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dekyil 'khor dri ma med pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzungs
0 dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sams dpa' rnams phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi sku na ngon par sprul nas chos ston to// chos nyid las kyang ma g.yo la/ 'gro ba yang mad/ 'ong ba yang med do// sems can rnams yongs su smin
par byed kyang/ sems can du ngamigs pa yang nang do// chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do// bar 'pho ba dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med/ skye ba yang med do// chos/
thams cad la rnam par rtog pa mad nga 'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang ma 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'du bshad pa na/ byang chub
soms dba' sum stong gis ma skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dang 'a med mad pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog par gyur te// dge slong
dung dge slong ma tshad med pa rnams kyisan/ rjes la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo// sems can tshad mad pa rnams kyisan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu
sems bskyod par gyur pa dang/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod dam chos 'ad// zab cing phra labalta
dka' ste/ 'dod pas bsgribs pa'i dmus long dag/ de ma mthong bas sdug bsngal len// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang/ ston cing gnas pa der bdag
cag thamasacad mtshosanas chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te/ de la phan pa dang/ bdeb stsa' cing lus dang sems bde bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gsas mas rtse gcig tu gyur pas mchod par
rgyu bgyi'o// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par bgyi'o// rgyal po'i yul der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang chu ga ya nga bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang 2/
skye bo mang pos rgyas shing yongs su dar bar bgyi'o// chos 'di bshad pa 'gems dkyil 'khor 'ad lha dang mdeng/ lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad
rma kyiso gi rdzi shonge gtsang mar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos 'di beshad pa'i gnas 'dan/ mchod rten lags pa'i slad du/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ me tog dang/
bdug pa dang/ lhab lhub kyi yongs sumachod bar ba gyi'o// bad ga cag gis kyang rtag tu bsrung zhing bskyab ste/ nyams pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa// shes kyi bu khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di sgrub pa la brtson nga ra gyis shigadang/ dam nga 'i ches 'di 'jig rten 'di'i yun ring du gnas nga ra 'gyur ro//
gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o////denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lhatsho byung
chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te rages kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gsar gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad labastod
pa pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dase 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang//
phyogasebcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang 'tsho ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ skrun gsar
gyi mdog du rab tu gad//dbyangs rnams kun ngas sangs rgyas gsung snyan to// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags nga 'a gsung// bung ba rlung ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing
lcang la byan tshesha 'dra// kho ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam nga ra mdzas par gda'// sbyanan re zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/ ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa/
'dra/ rnaljagasan che zhing leb la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma'adrar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod pad rtsa dung dang 'dra// bzuchu yi mdog 'dragayas su 'khyil//
thub pa'i smonem zla ba phra 'dra zhing// zla ba zad 'dra spyan bkra bung ba bzhin// zhal mtheshangs ni rtag tu lhangange ste// 'jam zhinges yi gsar ltar kha dog bzang// rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba
thams cad kyis// ro mchog 'jam zhinge dam pa mchog rab 'phags// spu yabu gnas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes ba g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthing 'dra bar 'tshar zhing ltung
lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes// bltams ma thag tu sku yasi snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na thems cad gang/ 'jig rten gsum n sdug bsngal mathal/
ba yas zhi// bde nga kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshani// sems ngamal 'gro dud 'gror 'grob dang/ yi dgas lha gnas ma yi gnas rnams su// sems can de dag thams car/
bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams n thems cad zhi// kha dog bzang ba gsar dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btsoma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med
zhal// 'dzum zhinge rnam mdzes shin tudri med zhal// gzhon nubatsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'dzam// seng ge 'dra par rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag rade phyag ni rab tu ringeb ste/
sa la'i lcog ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong// khyim stong ltar rang du lhang nge'o// thub pa'i dbang po sku mchog dri me mad/'ange rnams mtha' yas tham
cad rang du snang// sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge ba// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang/ mtshan byad zla bam mang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od na med pa 'gyur//
sangs rgyas nyame 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams na//zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dgun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsom sems can mthong//
bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i sku// phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi stong
gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyad// phra ba'i rdul snyad sangs rgyas gang 'das dang// gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyad 'byung ba dang// gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyad bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni
rab dang ba'o// ngag yid lus kyis ma tog dngulab dang// sngosa rnams dbul dang bsdugs pa brgya dag dang// dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag
dag gyur pa// snyingapo mchog rab sna tshogs du ma stag/ bdag gis bsku la pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gis yon tan rnams
kyang na// lce stong gas kyang cung zad brjod ma nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dgan thams cad kyi/ gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig
rten thams cad mtshor gyur to// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// sgra yi rtsa mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la man// lus dang ngag dang
yid rab dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang// des na soms can rgyal bar reg gyur cig/ de
ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstodanas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang// gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na//
rmi lam du ni 'ad 'dra'i rje mthong zhung// der na bshags pa 'di 'dra thos par shog/ rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// tshe rabs de dang der ni rnyed gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang// gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam na yang byis par shog/ nyin gyur tshe yang de dag ston gyur cig/ sems can
sdug bsngal mtsho las thar byed shog/ pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bgyis nas// phyin chad byang chub bla med thob par shog/ bdag gi zhong na 'gran zla med gyur cig/ ja phul rnam par
sman pa'i 'bras bu dang// rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du mthong bar shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cige/ gsar gyi log pa'i
dbang dang gsar gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'un gang yin 'di gnyis kyang// deran bu bo de dag gnyis ka dang// byang chub bla med lungabastan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag
gnas med rtenamed cing// skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten 'gyur shog/ sdug bsngal
kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid nga// ma 'ongs bskul par byang chub spyod gyur cig/ gsar 'od
dam pa yo ne bshags nga yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog/ bdag gi
bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ yashes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag ga ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog/ byang chub
yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i bshagasapa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rang du snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang nub snang ngo rnam dag gyur//
yashes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od na snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags
gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho lasan sgrol ba dang// bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod bar
bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing na rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis
bdag gi zhing// ma 'ongs dusan de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ mdzes pa'i rtog gsashes par byos// rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gos// sngon tshe smon lam 'ad btab ste// de nyid
daltar khyod yin no// sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis n/ gsar gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od// de nyid dngul tog dngul 'od ces// ngasan de tshe lung bstan to// 'khor mang de dag 'di
thosanas// kun gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa// da ltar ma 'os dus dag tu// rtag par bshags pa 'di byed shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa
dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i ye nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes ba ste bdun pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis / 'khor de'inan gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bar gnas pa la'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mchod cing/ bkur stir byed par 'dod pas gzungs 'du 'chang zhing gzung bar bya'o
de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzungs 'di 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyor/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya
cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag la dge ba'i rtse ba bskyod pa rnams kyis 'dzan cinge 'chang bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/
ma nyams shang skyon med pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu zab mo 'di la 'jug nus par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzungs sngagA/
bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a mtshan 'di dag brjod cing sems rtsa gcig pas phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o//
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyaga'atshal lo// byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags
pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// sangs rgyas shAkya thubapa la phyag 'tsha' lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs ba la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi
sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal go/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dbug med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyisangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal bo luphyag 'tshal go/ stong gi
phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'idang la la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba dam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal 'go/

sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal la/sas rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas sa mchog brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 'a// sangs rgyas padapa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs mnyam
par gzigs la phyag 'tshale/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
[à/ ]rgyas drisod 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla 'ong rnam dag grags ba'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
la// sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dge 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
lo/ 3sangs rgyas sbyan ras gzigs dbang mi 'jigA pa la phyag 'tshal la/ sangs rgyas 'jigs med grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rab mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
lardo[… ]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal la/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs 'di gden par bya'o/ namo rar
tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ta ku Ti ni e mo ro to// kosha Ni/ a ma rene/ a ri'o sAhA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas la
kha ka' stsal pa// gzungs 'di na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gzungs 'di
tha 'chang zhing 'dzanan bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tumed pa dag 'phel bar 'gyur ro// grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang/ mchod pa dang/ rim gro dang
bsngags par byas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tude la lung ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa// gang zhig
gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba des gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ rin po che dang/ mang du theng/ shang mkhas pa dang/ nad med cing tsha grango ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'thob ste/
bsod nams shin tu mang du 'bol 'go/ tsa deng ci 'dod pa de dag dang/ de dag thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzanan/ ban med/
[%, ]ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gsar gyi grong khyer ra bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dang la dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bang ga la chen po la
sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis srung bar byed do// bde bar gnas/ gzungs 'dod sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin par shes par rig par bya'o//
thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsi brgyad tshang bar bzlas bas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug nyin par khrus byas te/ gas
gsar pa gyon te bdug pa dang/ me tog dang/ zhal zas sna mang po la sogs bas mchod pa bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ thog mar sngar mos pa'i sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing sdoge ba bshags nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang
bar bozla'o// de nas lus bsrung ste 'dug nas/ ci 'dod pa de bsam nga ra bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig du bza' bar bya'o// de
nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang/ brjod dkyil 'khor de nas 'gyur bar byas te/ mi don bsod nams dang/ gza brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing/ bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te bsam ba mgrub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de phyin chad kyang rtag par rjes
su dran pa ra bya'o// gser 'od dam ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gsur can zhes bya 'o gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po dang/ lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang bde
ba'i phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa stong nga 'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ stong
pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bsanamado mchog dam pa 'dir// stong nga 'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya// sems can blo chung rnam par mashes ngas//
chos rnams thams cad shes par ma nus te// de lta bsan mdo mchog dam pa 'dor// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis nu nas shes 'gyur
tshudang / sems can 'byung pa'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang// thabs dang tshuladang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mde mchog dam pa dbang po 'di deshad de/ lus 'di grong khyer stong
ba ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams na demag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thamasaM cad grong gcig gnasamod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam bar m shesaso// mig gi dbang po gzugs
gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dra rnams phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu re la rgyug/ lus kyi debang po reg pa dag la rgyug/
yod kyi debang pa tshos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni skye ma lta bur g.yo ba yin// dbangabo
drug na yul la rnam dpyod da// ji ltar zhoge grong stong rgyug pa dang// dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing// dbang
po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems n yul drug gnas bcos te// dbang po 'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang//
ro dang rig bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug pa thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang
po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus n g.yo ba mdacing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung/ grong stong las kyi
'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnasagacigaja bzhin te// rtag tu
u// phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin pa zhin// khams kyi sprul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang// gnyis na steng 'gro gnyis n thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams
rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sprul dang chu la sprul dag dang// 'di gnyis 'og tu bad bar 'gyur ba yin// mo la sbrul dang rlung
gi sprul dag dang// 'du gnyis stang ginam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sa na sa dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dang// lha dang mi dang ngan song
gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i ke sa kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris ba zad gyur na// lus shig gson dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang// mngon par na dga' srin
bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor bshing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod nus 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang drag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams
cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa ya rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dog che 'byung min// ma byungab las byung zhing ma 'byung ste/ gang gi phyiran 'byung dang ma 'byung ba// de phyir
'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod d// yod pa min zhinge nam yang yid min la// ma rig pa yo rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do//
'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang// skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang// srid dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang// skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i
sdug bsngal bas ma gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor la ji ltar gnas ba dag/ chu byung ba las khyung dang 'byung dang// tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang// bdag gi lta
bar gyur pa gcad par gyis/ ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drel// phung po'i bainas la stong par gyur por ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya cher reg par gyis// ngas na bdud rtsi'i grong
khyar sgo yang spyi// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngas nu bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ sa ni bdud tsa'i khu bas bdag tsham byas/ ngas ni tshes kyi rnga chen dan da
brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung ga mchog kyang bus// ngasan chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni tshis kyi char pa dam ba phab// ngasanu nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal//
ngasan tshes kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrung// srid nga 'i mtsho lasasems can rang du bsgral// ngasanangan songagasum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs ma sa gdungs gyur ba//
don med gyuracang dpung gnyen med nga dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhabyas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tsham par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren
[. ]@#// pa bsam gyis mi khyaba mched ba byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan bas byang chub phyir spyod de// lag ba dang ni mog dang rkang pa dang/ (pan
lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang// nor dbyiganor bu mu tig rgyan dang gsar// brtudang rin chen sna tshogs btang// stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang// rtswa dang rtsa rnams thams cad
dang// nag sa tshal dag dang sa lasan// 'khrus pa thams cad gcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil
cha 'bor ji tsam par// phyi ma'i phung po sbungs nas nio// 'di la chagasum dbye bar nus// sa la rdulan yod pa rnams// stong gsum dgan thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi
khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang// de ni sems can gcig gir gyug/ shes nga de yis rdul rnams kyi// bya ma bgrang bar byed n ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags
brta rdas masan yi shes rab ldan ma rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus go/ thub ba chen po'i ye shes gang// skad cig gcig la 'jug
pa yang// bskal pa bye ba du mar na// gang du'ang bgrangabar ma nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//
de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thosanas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de 'a neng nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
bus mo yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te/ 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ byang chub spyod ba yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad
du gsol// rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal nga/ khyod la the tshom ci yod pa// dri de'i don da zhus shig dang// rnam par bya ste bshad par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol po/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisan/ 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyad//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo tshes kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi sbyod pa spyod pas na/ mnyam pa nyid la nan tan
du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji lter na/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas
te/ byang chub kyi sbyod pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa// lha mo de na phung bo lnga latshes kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/
dbyang san phung po lngatid do// phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa/ phung bo ljom yin pa yang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings denyid phung po lnga yin n ni med par 'gyur go gal
te phung bo lnga las gzhan par 'dodo nan rtog bar 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral bar mtha' gnyis la mi gnas ba/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ mang
dang mtshan ma med pa de na tshes kyi dbyangs zhes brjod do// rigasakyi lha mo phung bo lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ji ltar gdagasashan/ bung bo lnga den rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de
yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skya ba zhig yananani/ skyes zin ba skya 'am/ ma skyi ba skya zhes bya/ gal te skyes zani nga skyonanaM/ rgyudad rten kyang mi dgos pa 'dzegs go/ gal te ma skyes
pa skyon ni/ skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhin/ gang la skyes pa'i chos rnams n yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas mang mad nga/ mtshan ma med pa// gzhal ba dang/ dpag
pa dang/ dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo dbangan rnga'i sgra// shing dang/ ke ba dang/ lag pa la brten te sgra 'byung mod
0 kyi/ rnga'i sgra don 'das pa'i ng stong/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang stong/ da ltar byung ba 'ang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de shing las kyang ma byung/ dus gsum gyis ma skye ba ste/ gangam bde na mi 'gog
pa'o gangam 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o// gang nas kyang m 'ongs pa de ni gang du 'ang ma 'gro ba'o/ gang du yangs 'gro ba dan/ rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin pas/
gcig pa yang ma bani/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o// datsa'i phyore zhen/ gal te gcig pa yin na/ chos kyi dbyings dang bu mo ded pa sa/ 'onan byis ba so so'i skye bo rnams kyis
kyang rta don da ma pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur nga sa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'od ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhigen/ de lta ma yin pas gcig pa ma yin no// gal te tha dad pa ni
nani sangs rgyas dang/ byang nub sam dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang/ mtshan ma de nyid 'dzan ba yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang ma 'gyur zhing/ nyon mongs pa 'a 'ching
ba dang ma bral bas/ de blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'phags pa rnamAn 'du byed dang/ 'du byed ma mAn
ba yang dag pa'i ngo boragatsage pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin na// de bsan phung po lnga de na yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyod pa yang ma yin/ rgyu
dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa yang na yin pa tshig gas thog du ma phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa// rgyu dang rkyen med pa// dpes bstan du med pa/ thog
ma dang tha mar dben pa rang gi ngang gis stong ba ste/ dan 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur ba'o// de bsan phung po lnga la chos kyi dbying
su ston to// gzhan yang rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng nub don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par
'dod ba de ni dengag nga ra dka' ba sta/ 'phags pa dang/ ma rabs kyi spyod yul na gecig pa dang/ tha dad pa rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma sbyangs/ don dam pa dang
yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyinges la gnas shing byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
rigs kyi lha mo derab tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla goge phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
thal mo sbyar ba btud do/ spyi bos phyag 'tshalanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal la// de nas mamajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus ba de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rig sa kyi lha mo rin chen
'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi lha mos//
tshangs ba chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar nga tsamaM ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab bas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de 'don mi
shes te/ 'bags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni tshes bad la brten te/ bde bar gnas ba thob bo// gal te tshig de bden pa ba na//
snyigs ma lnga la 'o jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/ tshad med grangs med ba dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gsar gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan b/
skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/ rin po che'i bad+ma la 'dug cinge/ bde ba tshad med pa la longs spyod dang/ lha'i me tog mchog gichar 'babacinge/ lha'i
sa'i snyan dang/ rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byungaba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog cig/ ces smras ma thag du snyigs ma lnga 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can ji snyed
'khod pa de dag thams cad gsar gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan ba spyas nga yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma
la 'dug cing/ bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur ba na ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pan/ na 'gro thams cad med cangon bo che'i ljon shing sna tshogs bris
po tshesna bdun gyi pangs 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa rin po che sna bdun dang/ lha'i mi tog gi tshor 'bab pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa ba zhan du gyur to/
zlo/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud med kyi lus las tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cinge 'dug go/ byang chub sems dang 'a rin chen 'od 'phro la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di
skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod// sbaso pa/ tshangs ba'i rgyal po chen po nu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub

kyi spyod pa spyod do// rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// smogo rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa gzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do//
sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyod ba spyod do// de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//
btsun ba khyod don gang la gnas te/ tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing/ rgyu dang rkyen la ba rten nas grub pa'i/
phyir ro// tshangs pa'i skye la ngos sbas pa/ gal te de lta ran so so 'i skye bo thams cad kyang/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
ba'i rigs so// smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de skad ces smra/ byas pa yang gzhan/ ma khas pa yang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang nub ma yin pa yang gzhan/ rnam
bar grol ba yang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa 'ang gzhan ma yin bod kyi/ tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad naM/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa dang
dag par dbyer med ba/ bar mtshams med pa 'phel ba dang/ 'grub pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dperan/ sgyu ma mkhanAnam/ de'i slob ma
sgyu ma sprul pa mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gis/ lam gyi bzhi mdor/ sa dang/ bye ma dang/ shing dang/ rtswa dang/ lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul
pa 'di lto ste/ rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang/ dmag dang shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang/ bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
kun la ston to// de la sems can byis ba blun po ma shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong na/ sgyum sprul bar ma shes te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa
mthong ba dang/ thos bu 'di degan lang dag par yod pa yin ti/gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing/ phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do// de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can
rnams na de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin pa shesan/ thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang
dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mog slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang/ glang bo che dang/ bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag gan der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong ba dang thos
pa bzhin du bden bon yin par yang 'dzan la/ phyis zhib tu brtags na yang ba rdzun ba slu ba'i chos shes so// de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad
na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa dang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang tshig ga tha snyad la brten nas// yang dag pa'i don shes
par bya ba tsam du zad kyis/ don dam ban de lta ma yin no snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byas pa so so'i skye ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das ba'i shes rab kyi mog ma thob pa
rnams kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang gshis la/ gang mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ 'du byed ma yin pa 'chos rnams ji ltar/
brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjed du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so// de la 'a phogs pa rnams kyi sen gang gzigs
shing gsan pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang/ las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhus mngon par mi zhin te/ 'du byed kyi ris kyang ma
bdenang/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang ma bden nga// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du/ 'du byed 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/
bden pa'i reng bzhin du 'grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis/ kun rdzob kyi bra snyad la brten nas/ yang drag pa bdon ba'i don de ston par byed de/ de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po
gang 'bags ba rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i yashes dang/ 'phags pa'i gzugs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang/ 'du byed ma yin
pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la brta gnas gzhan la ston par byed do// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i rinichen 'od 'phro la/
tshangs ba chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// sems can ji snyed gcig gis chos zab mo 'di lta burtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa// tshangs pa chen po gang
sprul ba mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de nyid kyis shesaso// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul ba de dag nyid kyang
rang bzhin yod pa ma yinen/ de dag gi sems dang/ sams las byung ba gang nas skyes par 'gyur/ smras pa// gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma tshan/ med pa 'di
ma yin par yad dag par shes pa de dag gis/ zab mo de'i den lag bar nus go/ de nas tshangs pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rineman 'od ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di re mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/de de
bzhun te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis smos pa de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'bro 'dis khyod la je sked stan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shog dang/
mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang/ gzhan yong tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gosaM phrag pa gcig
tu gzur nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thAl mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di/
skad ces smras so/ deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cingebag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs
ba chen po la bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dba' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs ba'i dus na/ ni bo ma'i 'od dpal gyi snying bo zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs badru 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ blun mad pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurang/ lha dang
mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'atsho/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis/ blanamad
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyire mi ldog por gyur to// lha'abu khri phrag brgyad stong dang/ rgyal bo dang/ blon po la sogs ba tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul
mad cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshes la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur/ de nas 'khor 'dus pa de yin na dge slob khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod nga/ byang chub
kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par sams pa de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' dzin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas// byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing
brtan pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab ba blon med ba'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa phud de/ byang chub sems dpa'
la gsolanas bla na med pa'i mchog dam pa'i sems bskyod de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to// [>ga ga dege ba'i rtsa ba cu mchis pa de dag tham sa cad bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab po// tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis// bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du
bsgrubasanas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/ 'khor ba las yongs su 'das pa'ishes pa skyes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong de dag la
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas r du 'gyur te/ bskal pa'i mon rgyal bar dga' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal
po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi mongan dre me mod pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus gcig tukun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sta/ de dag kun kyang
mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gsar 'od dam pa mdo
snga'adabang bo'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de dag ni mthu dang/ gany+dzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhag gas/ thabs dang ma ldan pas pha rol tu
phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du sbyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gsar 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam
du bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ klog cing 'donan/ bsod nams kyi phung bo 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang zhabar ma bod pa nas//
grang subagrang ba dang dpar bskrun par yang mi bzod do// tshangs pa chen po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing/ nan tan dubasgrub pa dang/ gzung zhing gzhan la yang dag par
rgya cher bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub gnas dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsha/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor lus dang srog 'a mi blta ba
de bzhin du/ ngas kyang mado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang/ klog cing 'don pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to// tshangs pa
chen po dpar na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rtenan gnas kyi bar rin po che sna bdun yang med par yang mi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po ma bzhugs na/ rin
bo che sna bdun yang mod la med bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rtenana gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i tshes rin
po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro// mde sde'i dbang po 'di nas med pa na/ gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal bo 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/
mnyan pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ klog ba dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang/ lus dang srog la mi blta bas ngal ba dang/ dub pa khyad
du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyang nga ra bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhon du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o// de nas tshangs
ba'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang/ brgya byin lha'idabang po dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de
dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsrung pa dang/ yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o// chos 'di ston pa'i
tshib gegs dang/ bar chad kun bas la te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang/ kha dog dang ma thu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang/ lus dang sems
bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang/ gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de yang nuge dang dgra'i 'jigs ba dang/ mi ma yin pas 'tsho ba zhig
mchis na yang/ bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ de dag bde zhing skyod pa dang/ gnod pa rnams ma 'byung bar gyur na de dag kyang/ bdag cag lha'i mthu lags
bur 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig mdo sde'i 'odi la mchod cung rim gro bgyid na/ de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim gro bgyi'o/
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal bo tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi debang po la sogs ba rnams la
legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di deng/ 'di 'dzan pa la bsrung ba dang/
bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs ba'i rgyal bo la sogs ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid la brten nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas rgyal po chen po
rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po mgi ma bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pabcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang ngo 'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ga[é]ges
pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i
tshogs thamA cad kyis mchod pa dang/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon nga ra bstod pa// 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing ba sngags te/ brjod nas rang
tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bur bgyis pa// sems can thums cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid nga/ sems can dmyal ba dang/
dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshAne rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skams pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu
zlog pa/ mu ge'i ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyid pa// nad kyi yu ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// gzo'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid
kha / mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid nga/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na chos mnyan pa tshos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag
rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnamaM par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang/ stobs dang mthu
yang spyod par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan ng/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bdagatsag ni ches kyis lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin
dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dra wa dang/ mi 'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad nga/ snying rje ma mchis pa//
gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlag nag ra bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rtangeshu rtsa brgyad dang/ gnod spyin
'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das ngas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang
bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdagacagargyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes mang du chags so// btsun pa btsam ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzamabu'i
gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'dzems par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i ya nga ba 'am nad kyi ya nga ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang// gnod pa stong dang/ gnod pa//
'bum dag gis gtsos par gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgya la po chen po ba zhes gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyula'adi 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la
bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mam bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhes rdzu 'phrul dang/ byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ban/ yul gang dang
gang du mchibor/ gsar 'od dam pamado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa sna tshogs
stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal po gang gse yul du mdo sde dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mi bar
'gyur ba'i yul de dag lugasar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad ye nga bstan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasanam ma'i rgyal pos gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
po'i rgyal po 'damanan te/ de thos nas mdo sde'adebang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su skyab ba dang/ yongs su 'dzanang
dang/ yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung
bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyen ma ma de sdi'i debang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyiden btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das ba dag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis ma'i rgyal po de 'a ye 'a thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun
sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam ma'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po dad 'dzin pa la/
bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyed/ rim gror bgyid cing mchodan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgya la po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po chen po de la/ skyo la do thams cad ngas
klu ches bsta stang du bgyi/ ces bla mar bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ ul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po ba '-i lo'ags
so zhes bya ba byon te/ rgyal bo chen po dag legs so legs go/ rgyal bo chen po khyod yong legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed na sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa
dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum mang po la bsnyen bkur byus pa/ chos dang ldan pa// chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang ma rnams
kyi rgyal po byed pa'o/ 'di lta ste/ khyed na yun nge bor sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams
cad la phan pa dang/ bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa// mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nya bar ba sgrub par brtson pa//
yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bos/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde 'dabang po'i rgyal bo 'di la mchod pa dang/ rim gror byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis/
shogo yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ des na rgyal bo chen bo dpung dang/ g.yog dang/
gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu srung bar 'gyur
[79]/ ubya// ro/ rnayongs su skyang ba dang/ yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang/ g.yog dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa
khyed bzhas/ lha dang lha ma yon du g.yul 'gyed pan rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gsar 'od dam pamado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal nga pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dag ba snyan ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar
gyis gog/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam rjes kyi bu
dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal pa chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po ni ga mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tubagos nas/ dus
mo ga yas nga 'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan/
'das ma 'ongs ba'i dusan/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngom/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho/
brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig/ lha'i dbang po'i
dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal bo bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgya la bo 'di nyon tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam// dge
slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyan che mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'dzin ba de dag la yang bas stong du bgyid/ btsun bar bgyid// rim gror bgyid cing/
mchod de/ rtag bar rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i nus/ chos bdud rtsa'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog
tubacas pa bzhi dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byon chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang/ ma thu dang/ stobs chen por
yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gatra byon dang/ dbal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cig rgyal bo chen po bzhi/
dpung dang g.yog tu bcas nga/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi geda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/
yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgya la po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po//
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan ba dang/ rim gror brgyud pa dang 3mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su
gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhib dang bde legs su 'gyurabur bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang/ yul 'khor de dag dang/
yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang pa dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyurapar
bgyi// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o//
mi'o rgyal po gang la lags r 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen pa dang/ rim gror bgyid pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid ba de'i dgra zla 'dab zhu ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis
la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi de dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam bar gzhog ge
snyam du sems skyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dobang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab rtaba'i rgyal bo de gzhan
dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal bo'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang/ nad kyang/
'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brol ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nyo ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du byonen/ gnod pa sna/
tshogos brgya dang/ brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byungang// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi
dmagatshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung// dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mami 'tshal ba dang/ gang na gsar 'od dam pa mdo/
sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gazhig par 'tshal bar 'gyuran/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi dbung dang g.yog tu bsus pa
gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyidade/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyidanas ldog par
bgyi'o// 'brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bur bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmagatshogs de mchi bar
thaM yang munusan/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa ltag la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal bo chen po
dag legs so legs so// rgyal bo chen po dag khyed yung legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang/
dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbangabo'i rgyal po 'di nyen pa dang/ rim gro bgyid pa dang/ mchod ba byed bde dag la kun tu srung
bar gyis shig/ yongs su skyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su sbyang ba dang/ chadapa sbyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shige/ rgyal po'i pho
brang 'khor de dag dang/ grong khyer de dag dang/ yul 'khor de dag dang/ yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su skyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su sbyang ba
dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shog/
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog bar gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i rgyal po de dag ma 'thab pa dang/ mtshang ma 'du ba dang/ mi rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed
par bya ba la spyod bar gyis shog/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dgan/rgyal po chen po brgyad khri bzhi
stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang/ rgyal srid kyi debang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang/ rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam bar ma 'tshab dang/ ban tshun
rnam par 'tshe ba ma skyed pa dang/ rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal bo thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang/ phan tshun du g.yul 'jog par mi byed ba
dang/ yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ ba rol gyis ma gnod pa dang/ nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i/ grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dgan/ rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams
pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du ma 'thab/ mtshang mi 'du/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyod par rang rang gi yul dag dga'
bar 'gyuran/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhes 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ la ligs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo
ga/ dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par
'gyur/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang zla ba dang/ rim yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thamA
cad n gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor 'bru thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang/ ser sna med par 'gyur/ ga dang ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las
lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bo chen po dag la
la zhig mi'i rgyal por 'gyur la/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas// mchod bar byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag
bsnyonanam/dge bsnyan ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsdu steng du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing/ rgyal bo chen po khyed bzhi dngung dang g.yog
tu bcas nga/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyanan/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung/ chos bdud rtsi'i
khu ba 'dis/ khyed cagag 'us 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lug 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel la// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs
kyang skyod do// khyod kyi gzi brjidi dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab ba rgya chen po yangs pa byas bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar/
byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na
mi'i rgyal po chen po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa
spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsunamo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ rmadapa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs[4]
su 'gyur bar byas par 'phyu'ar/su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang/ des gzi byin dang ldan pa dang/ ches stobs dang ldan pa dang/
bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba snatshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang/ ul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur
yongs su skyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi demag tshogs thams cad kyis ma rje ba dang gnod pa med pa dang/ 'khrug pa med par
'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po'aphags skyes
po dang/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal bo'i bu mo
rnams dang btsun mo 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang/ bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhabe dang/ bde legs su
'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa blan med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dang da phug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyidabasam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma maming yang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/
bdag gi sa yul thams cad kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang ba 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod ba ma mchis pa dang/ dgra ma mchis pa dang/ b.rol gyi
dmag tshogs kyisami rdzi ba dang/ nad 'go ba ma mtshis pa dang/ 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyuran/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yang bam
mchis pa'i sems dang/ gus pa dang bcas pa dang/ ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dmad mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od
dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di menyan ba'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des/ rgyal bo'i bo brang khyad par du 'phags bar mtshabor bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang/ rgyal po'i
pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab cing/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram por bgyi'o// sngos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der/ chos kyi khri mthon po na
u// sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o//
mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma'
ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal bo'i rgyags ngas dregs par ma bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par ma bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal
dang/ dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs ba'i soms kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du
shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams
la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa rnams dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam ba sna tshogs spyod dustsal bar bgyi'o dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma
00mchis pas bdag tsham bar bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa sa bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam bar bgyi'o//
bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyod nas/ chos skya ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ rgyal
bo chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal de rgyal pochen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal bo des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang
rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan bar bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang rgyal bo'i bkod ba chen pos bkra shis tha
dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma'i rgyal po der gom ba ji snyadabor ba
du stod kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrige 'bum phrag gis 'khor ba phyir snyol bar 'gyur/ de skad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/
dar gom pa de snyed bor ba de nyid du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrogo'abum phrag du mar gnas
yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lha'i re ba 'bum phrag dum theb
par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po theb par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ ljobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os
bar 'gyur/ gags ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin turgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yon du bcos pa'i 'jig rten la phan
par 'gyur/ lha dang ma rnams kyi bdeb rgyan zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzung bar 'gyur/
mdzes pa dang/ bstan sdug pa dang/ kha dog bzang po rgyas ba mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu mad pa yongs su gzung par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'irgyal
po des dpag tshad tsam du chos skya pa bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du yang bsu ba bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyod par bya'o// yang 'di sum
du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin bshegs pa dgrabcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'diring shos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gso de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang ma mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang/ ma byon
pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang sashing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba
dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gaban rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'irgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag du ma thob pa dgag dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyod par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon
bskyed bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob bu dag gi dge ba'i rtse ba'i sa bon bskyed par
'gyur ro// deng bdagagis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro/ dang bdag gis ba so danams kyi phung podabag tu med pa blun/
mad pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad labasrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng
bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi de dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyang ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ dgrumad pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba
dang/ nad 'go ba med nga dang/ 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyan
ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'i rgyal po 'di' dzan pa de dag la/ mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bu s bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ mi gror byed/ mchod par
byed cing/ rgyal bo chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ lha'i tshogs de dag dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dem pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams
mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang/ tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi de nga phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam bar 'aphel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la
rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gashra ba rjod kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/
dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun bar ngashin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen bo de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal bor gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bu s/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bskon
nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsko dang brgyadi/ bla mar bgyidi/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par brgyad tsang/ rgyal bo chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal
po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag bdar bgyidi/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag
nyan cing/ bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shes cung zad cig sbyin par bgyi den/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slongachos smra ba de chos kyi snyan
la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal bo des bdag cig rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasu gsar 'od dam ba mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i sled du/ bdug bas bdugasam phyag tu/ spos sna tshogs las spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shange dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang
cig yud tsam de la rgyal bo chen po bdag cag bzhi'i red rang gi khang pa'i stengag thor snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shong dag gagadugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri
rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des bdag cag gi khangapa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsunapa bcom ldan
'das spros dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi khregongedag/ skad cige thangatsag yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs
can ma dang/ lha mo chen mo brtan mdang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dgashes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lho shu rtsa brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang/ 'brog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i
rgyal bo chen po rgya mtsho dang/ de dag ga reng rang gi khang ba'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shong gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur gros dri sna
tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam bar 'gyur khang pa rnams kyi nang du gsar du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis bar 'gyur ro// de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces ba ka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal bo chen po khyod bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng
ga bar snang la spos dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi khri shong de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyal bo chen po dag/ ma'o rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo
