sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gso ba dugs ma thag tu lagan pog stod tsag thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khroshing
rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di deg thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ nyame bya ba/
phrag brgyadang/ rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang/ ri'i rgyal po ra reb bye ba phrag brgya yod/ ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po bye ba phrag 'argya dang da
glinge chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag rgya dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha bya ba phrag brgya dang sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'dushes med min du 'bar songanga'i
bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgyadang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya bo thams cad nas/ lha dang/ klu
dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am tsangeng lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gakhang pa dag gi stong ga bar snang la/ sngos
dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shong de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ sngos kyi dro rgya chen pa yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba dang
'byung bar 'gyur zhing tung bdes kyang lha'i khang ba rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i
khang ba thams cad kyi stong gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i khro shong de dag gdugasa rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di lamachod
pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des sbos sna tshogs de dag gseb dugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyalapo 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus sbyos dang/ bdug pa sna tshogs

kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skud cige thung cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung ga phyi ma snyad dgag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag/
khrog 'bum phrag rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgagi bar snang la spos dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi khro shong rnams su
gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgyan zhing che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog ltadu'o/
snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal bo chen po dag
'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thug tu de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan/ ches sla ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu
dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam ba khyod gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon
tan bsam gyisam khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod ba/ khyod gang legs go legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/
ro/ rtasu than gsara'od dam pa mdo sde 'a dengang bo'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang/
ba dang/ klog ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'khor la rgya cher yang dag bar rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ skyes bu dam pa gsar
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi byim snyad dgan/ de bzhin gshags pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dug gis/ de'i de'i dusan tshig 'thun pa dang/ ngag 'thun pa dang/ sgra skad 'thun ngas dge slong chos su ba/ chos kyi khri stanub
'dug pa de 'a 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs nga 'dusan byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snyingepo mchog dam par song ste/
shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jage rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags ba/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub spyod
pa'i stobs bskyes pa'i byon gyi rlobs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrige 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyo shang gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sdingasam gyis
ma khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'juges 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi skong ngo//
mchog dam par song ste/ banamadab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub depa med par rab tu zha be/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor 'o rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstan pa mchog tu zab pa// bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu skor bar 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod ches kyi rje chen po bla na med pa 'bar ba rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bran med nga 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen bo
sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi sgron ma blan chad ba 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char glan med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu
dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum shan tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs ba chen po'i
'a rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod/
ga ngasargyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par 'gyur zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus mi'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i yon tan tshe 'di 'am/ ma 'ongs pa na 'byung 'di lta bu 'di dag thongs/sangs rgyas
'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dang ga tshu ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gakhang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khroshing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma/
[j]thag tu/ lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtse gas nga phyag bdar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa// sngos chab snatshogs kyis chag chag legs par/
btabang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan nga 'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
brgya byin dang lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang/ lha me chen mo dpal dung/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dang na chen
po nyi shu brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'gan rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang/ 'brog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor
can dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus me gda'abar brgyus te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis
brgyan pa de ga la ba dang/ chos skya ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der/ chos ma nyan/
pa'i slad du maminger 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dbung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phragadu ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis
te mi'i rgyal bo dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa// dge ba thob par bgyid pa// blan med nga/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim/
par gyur ma brag tu/ ma'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar
bgyid/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang/ grong khyer de dang/ yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung nga dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/
zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid do/ tshad ba spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der ya nga 'jigs pa dang gnod nga dang nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thums cad las//
yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad byung la/
tshu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'o rgyal po de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma gas ra 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsko stong
du mi bgyide/ bla mar ma bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ bdagacig rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'ad/
dang[0f10 ]chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshan da ra ma bgyid/ rim gror ma bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang rnam par 'phal bar ma bgyid do// bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang/ ma ju
dang stobs kyang ma skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po
chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de ya la bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun nga bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de
ya la bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang/ yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bon/
yul der yul rnam par 'khrug nga sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas ba'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang
mtshang 'drub skye ba dang/ rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngegs dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang/ gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa rnams sku man
ltung bar 'gyur/ gza'adad/ rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ban rim lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza'i dang/ nyi ma'i gza'
'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang/ rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus sunam mkha' la 'ja'i kha
shrI dog lta bu 'khyams par 'gyur/sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grags par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drug po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par
'gyur/ ul du mu ge'i ya nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dems/tshogs kyis yul 'dzems par 'gyur/ yul do bung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/
yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog 'bacas pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du mdang/ yulan gnas
pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyi yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la
tshu la zhig ma'o rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad
bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi don ga tshogs thams cad pham
par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod
pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad la sasu thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam
pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dimartan pa ra bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du
bgyi / bu mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhu dngung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang
chos bdud rtsi 'o khu ba 'di tsham par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus
mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang/ drang srong mngon/
par shes pa lnga can rnam pa snatshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji
snyad bstan pa dag bas ches mchog/ tshes khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal bo 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum
brag de dag dang/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phag/
[4, ]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so// canes kyang 'dzam bu'i grong thams cad na gnas nga'i mo rnams kyis/
rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang/ nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas rang gi yul kun tu srung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su skyang bar 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas
gul thams cad n gnodapa dang/ dgra ma mtshige bar 'gyur ba dang/ tsanis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas yul de dganand 'go
ba ma mchis shange/ 'khrug ba ma ma chos par 'gyur ba dang/ ca nes yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug par ma mchis shong mi rdzo bar 'gyur ba dang/ cines mi'i rgyal po do dag gis/ rang rang
gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen mo 'bar par bgyis shing/ snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang/ rinas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang/ lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba/
dang/ ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dngung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshams pa dang/ rim
gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ tsanas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/
mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang/ rinas bdag gi lus la gaDibarjod dang/ dpal dang/ phun su mchogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ tsanus 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtsis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad n gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ dga' ba
sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ rines sems can thams cad bska'ang bye nga khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs nga 'i dus na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bde
dag thams cad ldan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang du bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag dag bas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rjechen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi lha'ilegs dang dag ches 'phags pa'i de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang/ drang srong mngon par shes ba lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum thums cad ngas chos 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// ma'i rgyal po'i dgos ba dang/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang/ rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i glong thams cad
a na mchis pa dang/ gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir dngar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshadado// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das rgyud dang rkyen des/
[n ]mi'i rgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyigus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i bur rgyal po chen po byed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas nga sa/ gdon mi za
bar ma'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang/ rim gro byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyire sprod rgya cher gyisashig/ rgyal po
chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanan/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad nga 'dzin du chug cige dang/ de dag lha
dang [5 ]mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad
par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po byed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanas/ dge bsnyan ma bsrung ba dang/ gnong ba med
pa dang/ nad med pa dang/ 'khrug pa med pa dang/ soms bde bar 'gro zhing/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge
ubya// slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma na de sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu basrung bar bya yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung
ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam rjes kyi bu stan las langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
ra bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes ba'i gzus mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dang ga du ma mchis
par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu de 'a ba dag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
chogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang ba/zungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo nge bgrang tsaya/ ma hArA dzA ya/
tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no kuno/ khun khuno/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba ka rakar/ bikAran/ mahA bo ke ran/ mahUb kA ram/ mahA kA la/ mahA rA dza/ rakAraka tumAn/ sarba
sa tAnAn tsa stahA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar 'an bdun byas nas/ dpung pa la btags na don de nges
par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khang pa dben pa'inangan/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang/ tsan dan dang/ ga bur dang/ du ru ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ sdos
dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag ma mnyan par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mnong cing sngags 'di bzlas pas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo de grab NA ya// mahA d+hAn dA yA/
tsanaNe shA rA ya// A kar 2/ a pa ra dza te/ tsan be shA rA/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwA/ hi ta tsan ta/ ma ma d+han bar d+ho/ par+yashe snga yam A kArab yA sAhA/ sngags 'di
lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la par phyag 'tshal bar
bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu nasems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bdo bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags
'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarayid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyiba'i
sngags kyi snying po 'di skyasaso// na mo rat+na tra yA yazhamo be shra ba NA ya/ mahA ra dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa mis mi/ su mu su zhu/ tsan Da tsam ra/ tsa matse ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki lo
kI la/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sanadA ya/ Ad ma nam/ na rkyen/ an dar d+hA tu swAhA/ na mo bi shra ba NA ya swAhA/ rnyan dA ya swAhA/ ma no ra tha pa ni du
tho ra na sAhA/ sngags 'ad sder lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang pa dben pa'i neng du lceba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshos ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bsra
pa 'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chadang ra bya zhing/ nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcige bas sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas pa ni/ de nas rgyal po man po rnam thos kyi
@# bu'i sros/ dzani sha b+hazhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis// de'i gan du mchis te/ pa'i yab la ci zhog gsol zhes dri bar byed do// de nas bdagan dkon mchog gsum la mchod ba'i
phyir/ nor zhig gsol rgyas stsal cig ces smosangashage/ de nas sras dzinar shab+has/ yapa 'a gsol pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig/
gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang/ yab kyis khyed rgyu du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Nabargya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas sngags bsgrub pa des/ ltas de lta bu
mthong nas don de grub par shes te/ gnas dbeneparaM bdag gcig du sngos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog/ gcag gzhag sa nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad nanganag
nor 'byung nga las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad ma tog dang/ spos dang/ zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang/ bre' cang 'bongs pa rnams la
yang sbyin pa yang mi zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tsho ba'i bsam pa bskyedan/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar
rtag tubasrung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ gzhan yang sus dang/ sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la
rtag par bsam zhing/ bstong pa dang bsngags bu bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhung lha 'khasogs pa rnams kyi mthudang/ bsod nams mngon bar 'brel
bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba rgyas pa dang/ bla na med pa 'byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhung de la
srung ba dang/ skyob par byed do// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tsho le dpag tu med par gnas shing/ ngan song gsum yongs su snang ba dang/ bgegs dang bar chad thams cad
kyang med par 'gyur ro// yod bzhin gyi nor bu 'di deg dang/ gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// galati/
longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yi de bzhin du grub pa dang/ bya dang gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sngags bsgrub pa des/
shA bdag mthong bar matshalan tshas brgyad dam/ tshes bco lngaton par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pa de dang sbyar ba'i chon rtsiso rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri mo/
'tsho mkhan gso sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs sun rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag
bu smad dang 'khor du bcas par bros te/ gnas der bkramanas/ me tog sna tshogs dang/ dri sna mang po dang/ mar me dam pa dang/ zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan rgyun mi
'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi ge yang bar bya zhing/ rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// namo'i ko na khA ya/ bud+d+ha
ya namo bdagra ba NA ya/ ya kA rA dzA ya/ mahA dza ye// sa tarA dzA ya/ na mashamahA de bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ sushud+ho su'ud+ho han han/ man kan/ badzra
kha zumu/ ku ka ti ke/ a lang kri ti/ sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA/ haha ka ma/ ba shra ba NA/ bre yi de bA bra b+hU ya/ a ho tseg hi/ mA ba lam b+ha/ thun thun/ pa ra s+ya/ pa ra su/ dadI
hi ma ma/ dar shan/ kA ma su dar shanam man/ man pa la dA ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang/ mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang/
dga' ba'i ngesam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis ba gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lagan yide bzhin gyi nor bu gsar
gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa stocing/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'disad ces smra'o/ khyod ni
ci dong rtsa slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya sta/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ mi mang po'i yod du 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa 'am/
sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dengos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang/ tsha ring bar 'dod pa dang/ sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin
du grub par bya'o// bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod n yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/
rin po che'i gter ma bod pa dang/ bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dper na ni zla 'dis la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang/ sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang
srid kyi bden pa'i tshig 'dinenam kyang slabaram 'gyur bas// rtag tu bde ba dang/ yade bzhin du skyod pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcom/
ldan 'das mdo sde'i rgyal bo 'a de gang zhig 'dzin cinge 'chang ba dang/ klog cinge 'don pa yang rung/ sngags 'di grub pa yang rung ste/ tshogs chung dus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom
ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di beshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshig cig
tu 'byor par 'gyur ro// bdag gos kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gsar
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo de 'dzin cabargyas par byed pa dang/ sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bdag ga 'kher gnod
sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang/ rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bgo zhinge mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di sru ban da bar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su
gsol/ de nas rgya lu po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems
can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad drang bas phyug cingebade bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di skyes ba dang/ gzhan yang mdo sde 'di'ajig rten du yongs su
rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di bshad pa na legs so legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di deg gis bcom/
ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba kim 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal bam tog pad rtsa rdul med tshem//
rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho yashes chu yis gang// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang// rgyal ba'i zhabs ni
'khor las bris 'dra ste/ khor yugamu khyud de bzhin rtsi bo ma stong// phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas sbras pa ste// zhabs kyi dri ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gshag
rgyal ba dri mad gsar gyi re debangargyal// yon tan thams cad ri debang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas r dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra/ nam mkha'i deng
yang mtshungs ngashing 'dra ba ste// sgyu mamag sgyu lta bur chags med nga// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la/
tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// stobs bcu dag gis gsar 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson
'grus rab tu brtan pos bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde'idakon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ 'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir yun ringe gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dgan ngan song sdug bsngal dang// sems can dmyal pa'isems can rnams kyino//
sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pas na// 'dzam gling 'din 'dzam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos
rnams kyisan yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang// shin tu 'o legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing// 'dzam bu'i gling na thams cad dag na
yang 3sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba rgyas// 'don me yi dbang po gang rnams na// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang// rgyal srid rnam par 'byor nga dga' ba
des/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di me nyan par bya// mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed///
mchog tu 'jigs pas 'bongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim n yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis
kyang/ (mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta// dper na chu grangaskom pa sel byed pa// tshabs nyam thagasmin rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo
sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// dper na rinachen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snodan lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/
mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ne lha ya tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po
dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu du gnas nigs rgyas rnams kyis kyang// mdo sde'i dbang po 'din rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pan// sangs
rgyas rnams kyis legasazhes brjod pa byon// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dbang zhing rab tu mgu soms kyiso// mdo sde'i
ku// dbang po 'di no mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga'
shA bas mdo sde 'debang po 'dazhi nyand ra byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yo sen// gzi brjid dang na lto bas dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byone chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shan
tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhiso/ bcom ldan 'das latshigs su bcad ng 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang/ ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar
gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs yud tsam zhig dusanas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bdo bo bsam
gyis mi khyab ba dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog mnar bdag gis gtor mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang/ stan rnams las
langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcige tu bgos nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga lnga brgya dang/ chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang/ yongs su
bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos skya ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang/ bdag cag gis de la
dran pa dang/ mi brjed pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'ang deg gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnam/
kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas// nams kyang nub bar mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tsho/ sems can de
dag gis ye shes dang/ srobs ba dang/ bsod nams kyi chogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing
'khor ba yongs su spungs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal bo chen po bzhis
yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba sa bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal ba/ gAr du
ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dano/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi me dang/ byang chub sems ngapa'i sngon
gyi spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
shA bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs na yulan ma gnas/ phyogasad mi gnas pa lags na/ ngacom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshog ga
tsha don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ shA ra dwa ti'obu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen de nas
pa pa dang/ theg pa chen po la mos pa dang/ theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin nA/ shAr dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungasan yul nam genas/ phyogs nam gnasashing/ chos kyang
ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yabam yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang
ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba yongam yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos gangag sgrub yang ma
yine/ 'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
dang/ sangs rgyas kyis brlab ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i 'o ma rgya
rigs pa dang/ stobs kyi gnas ston pa legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsem ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob ngas gang la gnas ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang yang dag par
dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang/ lam 'ashin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi tshos kyi rnam grangs bshad du/
gsol/ bde bar bshegs ba bstan du gsol/ de skad cesagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'o/
bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal la gzungs thob pa 'phying
chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ rim gror byed pa dang/ mchod bar byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas pa'i 'gyur go/ shAr dwa ti'o
bu gad gzungs 'danyen par byed pa dang/ gang dag gzungs 'da'achang bar byed pa dang/ gang dag mos par byed pa/sa de rnams la byang chub kyisams dpa' dang ma la
bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te tad+ya thA/ san d+hAran/ ud d+hA kAn/ su sam pra tiSh+Tha te/ su nam/ su pra/
tiSh+Thati/ ba dza ya ba lA/ sad tu pra tu// su a ro hA/ dzAn pra tI kI ud bA da ni/ a ba na ban/ a b+hi lin/ a b+hi byu ra/ shub+ha ban+te/ sunatATi tA/ bahu gum b+ha/ a b+hi po dA
sAhA/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa 'gazungs kyi tshig 'do byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang/ legs par bzung dbyas nas 'chang bar byed pa de bskal pa ga
bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang smon lam zad par ma 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma
yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'dan 'das ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byonapa'i sangs rgyas
rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta// chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'ichos kyi rnam grangs yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcurin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams la yon du phul zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang/ zhal zas kyi nos pas bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
la tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed pa ra'agyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tsha dang ldan pashAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i
gzungs kyi ngos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'adabang bo'i rgyal po las// chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'a'i bu
sa bcu gsum pa 'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' skul pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis glogathams cad bzlog pa/
so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi ye ngadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs ba/ nga yang d ltar 'chad kyis zung zhige/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glegayod/
kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogasan 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i
xxx
bar shes par bya'o// glog gi mnge 'di dag yi ger bros te/ gnas gang dug tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/ glog thams cad ma 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
'a tsho/ dwa ba khe'i sngags kyi tshig 'di deg gi bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni ma ni ma/ naman der/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lagan rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thamA
cad bdag 'a srungasashoge/ srungs shig swAhA/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
'dug pa des bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ dwang kha'i gsang sngags kyi tshoge rnams brjod/
[%]par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Te ba ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra tu ni kaM pra tamo tre/ shud d+he/ mug te/ bon le/ pra b+ha sar/ aTar/ pan ra re/ shA te/ pan Da ra/ bAsi
na/ ha ra ken Da ra/ ka pa 'o/ ping+ge la/ a'i de d+hi mu khaM/ dus ma saMn par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gogazi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par ba de thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la//
la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzugs kyatshog rnams
brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mun muni/ mu nAn d+ha re/ ma ta ma ti/ su ma ti/ mahAm/ hahahaha/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras
kyis dra khe sazhwa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrungabagazhan gyis ma thub pa 'di gu'i snying la 'dzin tan/ ya girabris pa de bdag gse rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad
las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus da lags par 'gun pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o// de nas ma 'dzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzus kyi gsang sngags
kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi lo mo lo/ tsi lipAhA/ ba ha pu re swAhA/ brasAre swAhA/ brah+mab+ho su gad+ho/ dug sam sta re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
0// ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba sa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi
= bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
kho bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi chog rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ban be ran/ ban d+ha/ mnan te/
tin go ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsan ba laM/ ma tang gi/ puk+kas/ sa la prab+he/ nyAmam to ta ma/ ud tA ra naM/ mahor na/ mahor ni/ d+ha ra Nigi tsa kra da ke/ sha ba ringesha ba risAhA/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dinaM/ bdag gi rog sngags rdo rje'i lci 'beb pa zhes bkyi ste/ 'jigs pa tham sa cad las thar bar bgyidang/ dus ma lags bka'agum pa thams cad las
yongs su skyob pa la gsaso// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes pa dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang/ skya bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po
[.]la ba de pa dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rjem grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshog rnams brjod par bgyi'o// dpya thA/ push+yasu bub+be/ dum pa ri shAre/
Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shAn ti ni mug to mngag khya/ hi roNagats+tshe skya lta/ sta ba ti sAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'din rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi
ste 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tsha skyobab dus ma lags par 'gum ba thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang
klu'i rgyal bo glog 'od dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudad/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba chen po yod bzhin gyinor bu zhes bgyi bo/ glog thams cad zlog ba/ dusam lags pa 'gum
pa thams cad sol ba/ dug rnams ma gdug par bgyid nga/ gshed byed dang/ byad stems dang/ ro langs dang/ bkra mashes pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchison/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'dinas dbyung ba dang/ ser sna sgang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar dgongs teng zhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
cad klu rnams nim naser sna can te/ samasasar snas bskor ba lags so// tang thu/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ an te/ a ka ya/ a b+hi ye puN+ya/ ba khyung te
sarba pA paM/ bla shAman ye swAhA/ ar+ya pan du/ su bar n ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshog 'di dag skyes nga 'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don nam/ yi
tsha ger bris pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'adug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las
[@ ]byung ba'i dug de dag gso de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhon bzangs dag/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang
po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ dwab Do'i gsang sngags kyi tshog rnams bshad pa legs so legs so// phyogs rnams na gnying
log pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ brgya byon dang/ tshangs pa
dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang/ klu ba bdag po de dag dang// lha dang/ mi deng/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yu rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon bar bstodado// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/yade bzhon gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
nas lhamo chen mo dbyangs can rgyas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas nga'i lha nga sa la btsugasanas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdu
de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang/ dge slong chos ba de'i tshog brgyan pa'i slad du/ skyobs
pan bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gazhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos skya ba de le shes ba'i snang ba chen po bgyi gsar
'od dam pa mo do sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'an/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag gcig yongs su nyams par gyur tam brgyudan/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i
des pa'i sgra dang/ tshig dang yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// cines sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dgi ba'i rtse ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gdon
nyu// gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzam bu'i grong na gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang/ sems can du ma dag gse gser 'od dam pa//
! mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ tsho 'du le ma
phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ srog la phan gdags pa dang/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tumamachis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ thabs sna tshogs rab
tu 'tshel bar 'gyur ba dang/ bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang/ bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs par thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bskyud pa
mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang/ sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dengo ldan pa'i/
khrus kyi 'os brjod par bgyiste/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skye ba dang/ 'chi ba'igenod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rnyog pa dang/ 'khrug slong dang/ khrag khrug dang/ rmi lam ngan pa
dang rta log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ byed dang ro la ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i smon dang sngags ni 'di degaste/
shu dag gi'u wang ke dang/ sha mya sharma sha re sha// in+d+ra hasta kal ba che// r-im shangetsapa ga ru// sha re ba stasra rtsi'i bog/ gu gul ra sa ga la kaM/ rdo drag la ma rgya stos dang// tsan
dan dang na ldong ros dang// ga'u wang bcas ba ru rta dab/ gur kumazla sgang yungs kar dang// sbyin sug lan ladang// nag ge sor usha re// 'di dgaman menyam bgyis nas// skar
ma rgyal la btug par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/ lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma ta la/ na le dzan ka ra te/ hang ka ra te/ in dza la
ni oM kAr dre/ pashang dre/ a brtaka/ sa ken gdud ku/ ka be le/ ka de la ma ti kI la ma ti/ san g+hi/ d+ha d+hum ba taM/ shi reg re/ sad tu smra ti sAhA/ rtswa nges dkyil 'khor
bgyis nasen// me tog sale ma bkram par bgyi// gsar gyi snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzha zhog der yang gazhag
bar bgyi// rab tubargyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum ba thogs bar gazhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug bar bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba
dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bor bar dag tu me long bzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse sna sprad bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa
brtsam// sngags kyi 'os ni 'di dgagos// mtshan bcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// spyod la the dan/ a ra ka/ na yan/ hu lom la/ ka la/ khi kho le swAhA/
thaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snum legs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga ze/ ba ga ta ba ti sAhA/ phyogs bzhi
dgan gnas pa yi// rgyu skar dag gis mo srungs shage/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang// phung po'i las kyi 'jiges 'byung dang// 'byung bo khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid/
pa 3'jigs pa ma bzade zhigyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha ma bsha/ ma sAhA/ sa ga Da ba ga le sAhA/ ba ga khe de te hAhA/ sAg ra/ sam bud+d+ha ya sAhA/skan d+ha kA ya swAhA/
nI la kan khA ya swAhA/ a pa ra dzi te/ b.ru ya swAhU~M/ hA ma ben d+ha/ sum bud+d+ha ya sAhA/ a ni mi la bag ta ya sAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bra ny+tsan/ nam sAr sA t+yaM/ ma hAde bo
sad rgyun tu tshwa/ man tra pa dA/ ta ra tu btsati/ breh+pha nu ma t+ya sUhA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang/ chos mnyan pa de dag dang/ yi ger bris pa de dag gi don gyi med
du/ khrus kyi las 'dise bdag nyid der mamipar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad
thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// tsanas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur
ba dang/ 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba dang/ gza' dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rnyog pa dang/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ log
'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ byad dang/ ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod/
skye bo mang bo la ldan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyis sngags dang/ sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa na/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba
byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal to/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u da skyes lha mo
dbyangs can de bkug go/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes mdur brtswa yis
gos bskus pa// dur ba'i rtswa ya ges gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhagasanas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la/
dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod// spyod ya thengan/ mu re 1 tsane/ a ba dza/ a bu job ti/hing gu le/ mang gu le/ pange ga la ba ti 1 mang gu Sha/ ma rits+tsaM/ sa ma ti/ da
gam taM/ a gra tam grwa/ ta ra tsa/ ta ra tsa ba ti tsa ro tso'o/ sha re ma re/ ma ri tsu/ pra na pra ya/ le ka dza k+khil kasheshI/ leka pra yi/ sid+d+ha pra nga te/ b+hAm mu khaM bu
[% ]ri/ a pra dwaheti/ a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ namutsa/ mahA/ na mu tsa/ mahA de byi pra ti gA hA/ nam sa rAn/ bdagagi blo thogs nga med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang/ tshags
su bcad pa 'irgyudang/ sde snod dang/ snyan ngag la sogs pa la/ bdag gi roges sngags dngos grub tu gyur cige/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha wa/ hi lo ha lo/ mi lo mo lo/ bcom
ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ kA ra teka yu'u ro/ ke yu'ur ma/ dilo mo le/ halo ma lo/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/
chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ dbang po'i bden pa dang/ chu lha'i bodin pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jage rten na bden pa smra ba de dag
gi bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ha la me le u0f7a/ hi lamo lo/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo
chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas lha mo dbyangs can gyis gsang sngags kyi rnyog de dug sbas nus/yang
bram ze ka'u da rje la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad 'a spobagapa dam pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ shes rab che ba dang//
ner dang/ dbyig la sogs ba sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so// mdo sde 'da'adzin bsachog bstan pa'i phyir/tshigs
su bcad pa 'di deg smras so// gzungs 'di deng por su 'dzin pas// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob/
bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang dam rjes dang// byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang// rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing// rtag tutshangs nga ra
spyod pa dang// rim gro gus par bsam byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas sun// sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod// ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la// mchod pa rgya chen bsham/
par bya// skya ba'i rogasan mang po la// snying rje'i sems kyang bskyod par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtse gcig sams kyis bsam bya/
zhing// bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de yi tshig don legs bsams te// stong nyid bsgrub pa'i ng gnas par byos// bcom
tsha ldan thams cad mngon sum du// rtse gcug sems kyis bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang// gzungasa mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan dpal mgur
gsung chos kyis// dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing/ so sor ci rogs ya mtshan ston// de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa/
la rda/ rtag par bsam zhinge 'jiges pa spongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di// smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa// ji ltar
mkha' la mchags bzhin// sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gasung sgra la// de bsam smon lam tshad med 'grub// gang zhige dbyangs can mngon mchod dam// yang na slob bam man ngag
bzhin// lung bzhin tshes de gang bsgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur// gang zhig yishes mchog sgrub pa'i ng// rtsegacig sems gyis chos 'di gzung// bsod nams/
0 yongashesatshog sa'aphel zhing// nges par 'grub 'a yid gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor bsgrubanor bsgrubanor ldan dang// khe dang grags pa'i m de ngazhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod
pa'i ng rnam grol bar// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad med pa 'ong// bsaMm pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par
'grub pas yid gnyis srongs/ dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ren byas pa der// bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhi g ste// dus bzhin me tog bdug ngas ma chod//
ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bu// phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan// sangs rgyas dang ni debyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du// zhag
bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te lhade ma mthong na// bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na// gzhan dushas pa'i gnas btsal te// tshul
bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la// mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun ma gcod// bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la// nyin mtshan rgyun du nga rtson bskyod de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs//
des n bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ste 'ang bsam pa ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ yang na brtson pas lor bzlasan// mngon shes drug la sogs pa'i ng thob// de nas
khyaglu/ bram ze ko'u darkyes de skad ces bshad pa thosanas/ dga' ba dang/ rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ bor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang mi la
sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ sems ma g.yeng bur bdag la nyon cig dang/ bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir
'tsho tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o// phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dare dbang brnyes bar 'asngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyod
rgyu la bstod// dpal ldan thugs na nged ba dang// thes 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin// rtag dudabal la brtson chen spyod// g.yul gyi gnas
las rtag tu la// slong rdzobazod la dul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i srong mos lus ston cing// rtag tu dar gos sngon po mnabs// mdzes dang mi mdzes kun skyon cing// spyan
mgo su mthong sdang ba bskyed// spyod pa tshad med 'joge rtan 'das// skyabs su su'ongs rjes su 'dzin// bar 'ga' ra deng brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram//
yang na ljin stong nags rnams su// gnas de dgan lha mo'i rten// ji ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis// rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing// rtag tu lha mo de mchod na// thams/
cad dus su 'jig rten skyob// stag dang seng ge s 'khor byas shing// bya dang phyugs kyang de la brtan// dril chen sgra dga mngon bsgrags bas// ban d+ha'i re re grags par gyur//
phyagan tra shul thor tshugs dbu// yang n nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngo'i decu gcug gam// dgu yi dus su mchod pa bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas//
'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir// lhamo bsu'i gzugs ston pas// lha mo'i mchog de dang med pa'o// phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing// lhadag 'thab pa'i ng rtag
tu rgyal// yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas// bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi// bram zer sna zhing chos bzhi dang// rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas// drang srong lha yi
dbang brnyes pas// sa chen 'danes sa bon byed// lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang// rgya mtsho lud bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis// kun gyi gtso byed 'dul/
bar nus// mo rnams kun gyi tshangs sbyod mchog/ 'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs// rgyal po'i gnas na'ang pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzings// zla ba zhabazhin zhal
yang rgyas// mang du thos ldan rten ya nga byed// ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags// bsams pas gling dang rab kyang ston// lha min 'asogs lha rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan
bstod cing bsngags// spyod stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang// gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du lta// sems can gang dgaci 'dod pa// de kun bsam pa myur du skong// blo
myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang// sachen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag tu// rtag tu sgom chen snang byed bzhin// bya dang gcan gzan ri dgas kyi'ang//
kun gyi bsam nga yongs su skong// bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral// ma mjed bdag bzhin bden par
sa 'jig rten 'thun par gzugs ston cing// 'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang// khyodan lha mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog nga 'i sems can med// gal te g.yul
dang 'jigs pa'i gnas// ma ya dong du lhung gyur tam/// chu bo g.yang sa ma rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang// yang na dgra
yis gsad par yang// rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bisngal dag las thar par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge kun las skyob/ byams dang brtse bas mdun du gnas//
de phyir bdagan sems btud de// phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u do rgyas/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can latshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
ba0 gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyon// lha dang dri za wu dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi reb gang yin// lha mo dam/
pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med ye
shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur lta ba'i phyir// mchog nas gang gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub
byed pa dang/ yang dag sngags pa yon tan byed pa dang// dri med mchog dang pad+ma'abar ba dang// mag mchog dang ni mog gi dam pa dang/ dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mkhong
ba dang/ 2yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang// zla ba dang 'dra dri ma da ma 'od dang// ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang// seng ge mchog dang ma la zhon pa dang/
lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang// mda' gzhu mdung dang rdal gra dregra sta dang// ba can lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i
zhal[; ]yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang// shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang// ngags mchog sgrub byed he nas can dam pa dang// lha dang lha min dbang posamachod
pa dang// lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang// 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// sAhAbadag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o/ bdag la
thA yon tan khyad par klung stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub gsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di degani// nang par
langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang na nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos grub dag brgya chen thob par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze
N+No ko'u di rgya la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang/ bdeba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang/ dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad mdab
dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'udi skyes bstod pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig gas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gsolanas/ yang 'khor de dag la sa

ts+tso pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang/ de'i thugs rjes skyabacing/ tsho 'ad nyed la srobs pa thogs nga mdu ba dang/ thos pa 'dzan myonge shes rab chen po dung ldan par/
'gyur ba dang/ gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing/ tshags sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis/
lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang/
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par bden pa'i gosung la gnas pa// so so'i debang po dang 'thun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba bskal pa bye ba chod tshadabar yang dag par
bden pa'i tshogi rtag tu ston cing/ gsung ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo// bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling dang/ rgyalachen bzhi dang/ stong
gcig dang/ stong gnyis dang/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di deng ( phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing/ nyon mongs pa'i
gdung ba thams cad sa' ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal lo lcags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang/ bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan
par gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog/ byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags po rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog/ zung bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mtsho//
a @#// bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog/ yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo dbu ma dbyangs can mchog
skem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ gzi cen klu yang dbyangs can mchog/ mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog/ de gnas lha sras dbyangs can
mchog/ rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo b+ha mo dbyangs can mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lteno
dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog/ hi ro tshog 'chang dbyangs can mchog/ mamo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 'phrom mo yang dbyang sacan mchog/ gnod sbyin
kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog/ bdag la 'as mchog kun gyis stobs// mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// spu med pa la phyag 'tshal
la/ rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bcing po bcad la phyag 'tshal la'o// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang mdzad la phyag
'tshal lo// bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal la// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam sems la phyag 'tshal la/ 'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lhal
phyag 'tshal lo// bdag na tshig la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod/ nad med rtag tu bde ba dang// tshe ring ba yang thob par shog/
rag pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang// byang chub lam 'a brtson pa dang// skye bo kun 'o phan mang mdzod// ri ba thams cad myur du skyongs// bdag gi yang dag bdenatshag dang// bdag gis
ma slu tshig smras pa// dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshog la thogs med mdzod// lus dang
ngag la myur zhugs shing// yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag ga lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs sngobs pa ldan pa ra mdzod// tshig gi gashrI brjid mthudas ni// semA
can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod// bdag gis tshaganatse skyes pa// don da thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing// byed pa thams cad rgud na gson// nan
zhig bdag gi stobs 'dod nga// don de grub par ma gyur na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig na// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgyas/
bka'an 'dul bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang// byas pa gzo ba'i tshog rnams dang// hAdzi'i bu dang mo'u 'gal dang// bcom ldan 'khor rgya gtso bo ste// de la sogs
0[w ]/pa'i bdenag kyang// thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ sangs rgyas nyan thog 'khor rnams dung// bdagags dang 'dir spyan 'dren gyis// bdag gi re ba
bskang ba'i phyir// thams cad myur du gshigs par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i tshog gsol pa// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang// gtsang ma'agan
'tsha nu thams cad dang/ tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang// tshangs pa'i rkyel 'khor thams cad dang// stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang// mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang//
paN+NaM de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang// de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing// brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag
dang/ d+hagazhan yang 'phrul dga' lha dag dang// byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnam gyi lha rnams dang// 'thab bral gyi na lha rnams dang// sum cu rtsa gsum lha
rnams dang// rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang// gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang// sa chu me rlung lha dag dang// re reb lhun la gnas pa dang// chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang//
de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang// zur phud lnga can nor rgyas dang// nyazla gza' dang rgyu skar dang/ de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang// 'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas// de la
0 sogs pa'i lha thams cad// sdig pa'i las la ma mos pa// sangs rgyas la gus 'byung po'im// gu rab gzhan la byams pa dang// lha dang kludang gnod sbyin rnams// dra za dang ni/
lha ma yin// gzhan yang ma 'am ci deg dang// lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis// bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes brtse ba'i
dgongs pa yis// bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed// lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyis// gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing//
bdag la spobs pa mchog stsol cige/ ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs shing// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// sems can de dag thams cad kyis// bdag la stobs/
ba'i mchog stsol cig/ de nas dbyangs can lha mo la// bram ze ko'u da skyes de skad ces gsol pa dang/ lha mos skyes bu chen po de la dge'o zhes sas te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rags
kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshog de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ soms 'dun
pas rjes dmigasashing/ ci 'dod pa'i don tshog bzhin du bsgrubs na chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan tu phra zhing zab
wa/ @#// pa 'di 'dzani ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs
so de skad ces smras pa dang/ bram ze ko'udaskye rab tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar babyas nas rjes su 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha
mo dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang/ mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i sums can than
cad la chos 'ad lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ spobs patshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems skyed pa rnams kyang myur du blun med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so legs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi lo'u zhes bya stobaco lnga pa'o
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lhamo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang/ chos smra ba'i
dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ brel 'phos pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sams rtas par thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sems bde bar
gdugs mtshon bas par 'gyur ba dang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshag dang ya ge rnam pa tha na dud pa dgachub par 'gyur ba dang/ rnam par rtogs par
'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par brjod bar 'gyur ba dang// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i do nga de 'i rgyal
bo 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ mu ge ma mchis bar 'gyur ba dang/ la legs par 'gyur
ba dang/ soms can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'idusan/ bla na med
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang/ zas dang/ mal chadang/ stan dang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ sman zong dang/ yo byad dang/ 'tshog
chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dag slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
tha me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bzum dang/ gser gyi ro kha dog bzang po gsar du snadaba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// dus da ltar phyogs
gang dang gang du soms nga dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas
dang/ skom dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ 'gronabu dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tige dang/ bzhu dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram
dang/ yo khyad gzhan dag gis kyang mo 'phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byorapor 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhinagshegs pa de la
mchod par bya/ sa dang/ ma togadang/ bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/lha mo minamo dpal gyison gnas lan gsum brjod cing/ de la spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog kyang byin la/
ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu
dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu la tog lham sdong ljon shing rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyes// gas ra 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sem
can de dag la/ lha mochen mo dpal na sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpa' chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka'i
stsal te/ legasaso legs so// lha mo khyed kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mnod pa/ sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang/ bde bas phan
'dogs shing mdo sde'i yang yongs su rgyas bar byed pa'i bsod nams zad ma shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'as/ lha mo dpal
gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o///de nas lha mo dang la chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la 'dazhes byang phyogs
su ma rong ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyod mos tshul dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ban/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang
bzangs pad+madam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ban bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des// rang ga khyim phyag bdar legs por bya/ khrus legs
par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tudri zhom par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bzum dang/ gsur gyi re kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing/ mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal
gyi 'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sngos kyang dbul/ re bre ba sna tshogs kyang dbul// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po'i ming yung lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing me tog dung/ bdug ba yang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen med pal khyim de la sems bar 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen
mo dbal 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di deg dran par bya'o// 'das ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
0 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rim brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshigs
pa gsar rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal go/ nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag mod 'a phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang 'a mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa la phyag/
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang 'a gser gyi snying nga ngo la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dang 'a chos 'phags la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la phyag 'tshal la// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di deg la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la
'byor bar gyur cig/ spyod la the dan/ pra ti purna tsa ra/ sa man tAdar sha ni/ mahA bo shwa ra ga ti/ sa mnatabone na ga te/ mahA kAr+ya/ pra ti pra man sa ta an sa mnatA/ nu dra/
'khe bu ro/ u An d+hamatA/ mahA b+hogen/ mahA mo Di/ u pa sang ha ti/ mahA klashe/ su sang gri he ti/ sa mar bla nu pa la ni sAhA/ 'di degan spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshes
klo nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshogi gcig tu de lon yang dag par grub sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshog ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba khun ma tho ba med pa dag gse
la bdun du 'don cing/ 'dzin pa dag la yan lag brgyad pa'i bstan nga ra gnas pa 'a bsnyan tu/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad 'a me tog dang spros rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'du 'byor par gyur cig/ rgyur du 'byor par gyur
cig rdogatsug lag khang dang/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rungs/ khyim de shin tu gtsang bar byas la/ lcabs dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa yang dngul bar bya/
stan gtsang ma yang btang bar bya'o// sa la me tog gi sal ma bkram stobasdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dang 'a lhamo 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin
chad khyim mam/ grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal las/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sunam yang brel cing 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'gron bu dang/
gser dang/ rin po che dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang/ bde bar sbyar da thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang drag byed pa de dag
thams cad las lha mo dang la la shes kyi mchog sbyin par byas te denas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du da na gnas par 'gyur/ 'bongs par ma 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo min mo dpal gyis nor yongs su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste banu bdun
pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ grongangs/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lan/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/pho
[z ]bra nga 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lan/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'isman ljongs sam/
bo brang 'khor der btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchibe ra bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang/ sa phyogs gang dang gangan/ dge slong chos smra ba' de'atshis kyi khri shem par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dang gang du chos/
sbyab stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das su'i lha mi
brtan ma bdag phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan lag ga dem pa mgos dge slong chos sku ba de'i rkang
mthil nas brtan par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang dag par mchod bar bgyi'o
bdag tshom par gyur/ rim gro bgyis bar gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug nga 'i bar
[n ]du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi yang dag par rim gro ba/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sa'i bcud
kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu gza byon dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtsa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal sna tshogs
rnams M gza byon dang rab tu ldan par 'khrung bar 'gyur/ kun dga' ra pa dang/ nags tshal dang/ shing ljon pa thams cad dang/ la ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog
rnam pa sna tshogs pa thams cad kyang/ rob tugazi byon dang ldan par bgyi/ dri dang rab tu ldanu nga dang/ snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang/ rozhim par 'gyur/ bldan rab tu sdug pa dang/
rab tu che bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang/ bza'ab rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbang po rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur ro// gzi byon dang/ stobs dang/ gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur nas kyang/ sa 'a mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid par
'gyur ro// brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyi bar 'os rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi
@// bar 'gyur ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ nyams dga' bar gyur/ skya bo dang ma mang bos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzamabu'aglong gi sems
can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ng rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byonedang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
gser 'od dam pa mad sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzan pa de dag chos kyi khro
sgyu (stan la mchis pa'igan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nasakyang sems rab tu dang ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal bo 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhen/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rang tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang/ rab tu stobs dang
ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum
tshogs nga yang 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das su 'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur/ gzi byon dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus/
dang ma cu dang/ shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sachen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun nga 'i dzam bu'i glinge 'di sa'ibcudachen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sa chen po/
gzi byon dang rang du ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'osems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas 'a yangs par 'gyur/
sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang/ longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod de ra 'gyur/ bde ba dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad
