per ri'i phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas/ so mas rtsa gcig du thal mo sbyar te/ mgron
gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan sku mdog gser gyi kha dog ldan// 'od brar kun gsal gsar gyi bo 'dra// rnam dag rab mnyen pad+ma ngag dang
mtshungs mtshan mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod/ mtshan na sum cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan de// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs/ 'od zer rab gsal da pa zla 'od/
ma mchis// dri bral dper na rnam dag blu nyo 'dra// gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom pas// seng ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzod// dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po 'thun mdzad
pas ka la bad+d+hi'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags// bsod nams brgya yaM mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas// 'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga'// mkhyen blo rab gsal dpar na
rgya mtsho 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs// yongs rdzogs 'od dror phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang/ rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgol bar mdzad// nyonams sred pa'i
bag chags kun bsal bas// chos kyi skyon ma rtag pa'i rgyun ma 'chad// thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dogs pa sa// nga lta slad ma'adus tshe bde ba stsol// rtag par don mchog
dam pa rab bshad nas// yang dag rab dben mya ngan 'das la 'god/ bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i chos mchog rab bstan nas// bdud rtsi'i gya nom den na gsal mdzad pas/ bdud rtsi'i
grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas// bdud tshur 'dus ma bgyis kyi bde la 'god/ rtag par 'khor ba'i rgyu mtsho chen po nas// sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar par mdzad[']de dag
bde ba'i shul du rab btsud de// yod pazhin bang ba bsam mi khyab pa stsol// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho brab pa yangs/ dpe na mang po dag gis mig ma 'gyur// rtag par kun la thugs
rje char gzigs pas// thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyun mi 'chad// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho many+dza' ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du ni[”]lha ma thums cad lhan
thig dpag bsams kyang// cha shas tsam yang 'ge par yodzo mi 'gyur// bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las// a laga' zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ya// bsod nams
du dag skye dgu yongs bsdus nas// tsams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur thub smon/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdza pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/
legs so legs so// khyed kyis 'ad ltar de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems can la phan 'dogs shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas
sdig pa rnams yongs su byang nas/ bsod nams tshad med pa skyed par skye 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems d pa'
rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun no////de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs taM bla gos phrag pa gcig lagazon nas/
pus mo g.yas pa 'a lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gse mngon par bstod pa thub pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan
rtogs shing// yon tan tshad ma mchos pas sku rab brgyan// rnam dag rgya che sems can blta mos pas// nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis snang bar mdzad kha dog mtha' yas 'ongan rab tu rgyas/
zhichen pad+ma'i lung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes//dper na gdugs shar nam mkha'asnang bgyid bzhin// kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gzhon gsar gyi ri bzhi'i 'od kyis gsal mdzad
pas// zhing na brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab// sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas// bde ba dam pa mah+pha' las stsol bar mdzad// mtshan rnams phun tsho gas rnam dag rab mdzes
las// sems can blta mos skye ba yos ma mchis// dbu skra rab gnyen kha dog mthon mthud gnas// bung ba nag pos me tog bsdus pa 'dra// dgyes dang btang snyoms chen po dga' bas
brgyan/ byams dang thugs rjechen bo phun su tshogs// mtshan dang dpe byad dam pas rab mdzes pa// byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags/ bcom ldan bsod nams phan nam
btang bas// de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab brgyan pas/ 'od kyis zhing na brgya stong snang bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'od zer kun tu rdzogs pas na
dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra// bcom ldan ri rab bzhin du yon tan ldan// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston pa mdzad// bcom ldan gser khal dam pa rab tu mdzes
tshems dka' gtams pa dung gi kha dog 'dra// bcom ldan zhal mdzesadape zla yod ma mchis/ smin mtshams ba snga rtag par g.yas su 'khyil// 'od gzhen dkar gsal chu shul dag
Da mtshungs 1/dper na bla nyanam kar mas gnas 'da'u/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang rtswa pa tshe'i tog la bka' stsal ba/ khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin
00Na@#/ gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags ba brjod pa ni/ bsam gyis ma khyung pa 5na pa la phyag ga sa na// pad+ma da red sku chud pa/ de dag kyang
tharjes su 'thun par rnal 'byor bsgom pa slob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal pe las/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bsngags pa
brjod pa' le'u ste nyi shu brgyad do/// de nas byang chub kyi rishadi ga lha mas kyang tshigs su bcad de dag ga bcom ldan 'das la mkhyen par bstod pa 2 brtsom 2 tsam
dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal// yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal// chos man grong pa'i blo la gus phyag tsha rnam rtog mi mnga' blo la gus phyag 'tshal kye ma ngo mtshar
bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod// kye ma mthong dka' u dum po ra 'dra/ kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i ri rgyal 'dra/ kye ma ngo mtshar bde gshegs 'od tshad med kyi ma ngo mtshar kha sbyan
smon lam cho kye ma ngo mtshar shAka rigs nyi ma 'dra/ 'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas bshad nas/ d+hA N+Da la skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ sgrub da rab dang+gen rong
o mi mnyam 'jog pas// rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshags// rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la zhugs pas na// rab dbon spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen// rkang gnyis gtso
0 bo rab dben bzhugs pas na// nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong// chos rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas// sems can thams cad kyang na stong zhing dben// bdag ni
rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos// bdagan rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na/ 'jug pa ra de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dad maN+Dal// bdag
ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas// rtag par zhal blta sems kyis ma spyod smon// rab gdung du sems bar chad ma mchis pas// rtag par rim gro bgyis kyang skyo ma bgyud//
bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni reb bskyed nas// mdangs ldan zhalan bdag gis rtag magleng ma dzod/ 15com ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas// rtag par lha ma dag ni+isgra la bar
smon sku ni rang bzhin rnam dganam mkha' 'dra// sgyu ma smige rgyu chab kyi zla ba mtshungs// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas// yon tan phung po thams cad bskyed par smon//
bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang// thugs rjes yang dag spyod yul bsam ma khyab// nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar ma 'gyur zhing// drang srong byang chub sems dpa' dpog
ma 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas/ thugs rje chen po'i sku ni rtag mthong smon/ de las gsum ngal med bums gtso mchod nas ni// myur du nges byung yang
[ia]@#// dag mtha' phyogs smon/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa parjod pa gsan pa dang/ tshangs pa'i debyangs kyis/ sharje ga lha me la
zla bka' stsal pa/ riges kyi lha mo khyod kyis nga' yang dag pa'i ma brdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mtshan
mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsags pa legs so legs so// bsod nams 'dase khyod skyar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
zhing/ sems can thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur la/ gang gisathosaM pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur// gser 'od
tshe dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal pa las byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o/// de nas lha ma spobs pa chen mo stan/
las langs tegus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ yang dag pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
pa sku yang dag pa'i gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ mgur dung gi dbyibs dang 'dra ba/ zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu spyan pad sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ sgros dmar 'dre bar ba/ mchu shel gyi khaM
dog dang 'dra ba/ shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas/ gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur pas/ tshems dkar zhing thags bzad ba/ me tog ku mu ta dang mtshungs pa// 'od kyis kun tu
snang bar mdzad pas/ nyi ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa/ 'od kyi kha dog gis kun khyabapa 'dzam bu'i gser dang 'dra ba'i tshig gsung ba la zhen cing 'khrul pa ma mdza' pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo/
gsum yang dag par bstan nas/ byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/thugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing/ thugs kyi mos pa yang de bzhin du gyur pa/ bcom ldan
'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang/ spyod yul rnams rtag par dag par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa sbyangs pas/ gshigs shing bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul pa ma mnga' ba/
lo drug dka' ba mdzad nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba/ sdug bsngal bar soms can yongs su bzlas nas/ pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa/ sku'i mtshan
yongaso su rdzogs pa// n+ya gro dA'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas/ 'phani las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mnga' ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang
ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa/ gang ci gsung yang rung ste rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pas/ don ma mchis par ma gsung ba
shAkya'i rigs kyi nang na seng ge chen por gyur pas/ rab tu brtan tsad dpa' ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// deng bdag
tha ga nyams kyis ja tsam lcogs pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/ dpe ran sbyad bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal
ba dang 'dra yang 1 bsod nams de'i dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du spangs nas bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par smon to// de nas bcom ldan
'angs kyis/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms pa las/ spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas/ deng da'i yon tan rgya cher
bsngags pa brjod pa legs so legs so// 'di 'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo ma mngon par rtogs nas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/
thams cad rgya cher phan 'dogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo snga'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyai/ khyad chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed pa rnams dang/ lha dang 2 ma rnams dang/ 'khor mang po thams cad la
bka' stsal pakhyed kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ dus bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de thob pa'i chos shin tu zab pa byang chub kyi
rgyu yang dag pa bad yazhi pa de ni/ khyed la yang dag par bstan bzhin/ khyed cag las su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi
rnam gas 'di gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas/ rgya cher yang dag par spel te/ yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas 'khor ma de'i nang nas byang chub sems de dgacan
po bya ba phrag drug cu dang/ lha'i 'khor phal mang po bye ba phrag drug cu mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces 1 bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad la yang mos pa'i sems mchis pas/ bag
ldan 'das kyis bskul ba chen po tshad ma mchis pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus chus dka' ba mdzad de brnyes pa'i chos shan tu zab pa byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang lags pa de la gus
ras medas su bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yang lus dang srog la 'phangs pa ma mchis kyi bar chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra rgya cher sbrel te/ yang dag ba'i
chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas pa'i bgyid do zhes gsol te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mad pa de dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol
pa bcom ldan yang dag bden tshig gsung// yang dag chos la rab tu bzhugs// yang dag bden pa de dbang gis// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzan bgyid// thugs rje/
chen po go mnabs na// thugs rje chen la rab tu bzhugs// byams dang thugs rje de stobs kyis// mdo sde 'di ni spud 'dzin brgyade// bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas//
yashes gsan rab tu bskyed// tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad/ mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// log sna thams
cad rnam par bshig/ ngan lta thams cad bsal ba'i slad/ mdo sde 'dan srung 'dzani bgyid// 'dzag rten skyong dang brgya byin dang// tshangs pa dang na lha ma yAn// klu
dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas// mdo sde 'di na srung 'dzan bgyid// sa yi steng dang mkha' gnas pa/ yun ring 'dar na gnas pa rnams// bcom ldan bstan pa 'dzani/
bgyid pas// mdo sde 'dan srung 'dzin brgyade// tshangasaM pa' bzhugs bzhin tshus ldan zhing// 'phags bden bzhi yis rab brgyan nas// bdud bzhi dag na pham mdzad sar/ mdo
sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang sridi// thogs bcas nam mkhar gyur srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung bzung ba// sus kyang bsgul zhing bskyod
ma gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di bsrung ba bkas bshad pa thos pa dang/ so so nas rjes su yi rang ba'i sa nas bskyod nas/ yang dag/
pa'i chos de ngas su bsrung ba'i sems kyis cig car mgrazhi gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gso la pa/ bdag cag mdo sde 'ad la na// bu dang bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas// thams cad tsa
gcig rab bsrungs nas// rgya cher yang dag sprul bar bgyid// gang zhag mdo 'di rab bzung nas// byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgyid na// bdag cag rtag par phyogs ban nas[(]srung
skyob rim gro dag kyang bgyis// de nas brgya byani lha'i dbang po gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos ni thugs chad nas ne sku bsab par
bzhed pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' phan gdags slad// 'jig rten 'das kyang mdo sde gsungs// bdag kyang sangs rgyas de dag la// dra'i bsab slad du rtag mchod nas// 'di
'dra'i mdo sde 'di dang ni// mdo sde 'di la srung bar gyani// de nas dga' ldan pa'i lha'i bu rnams gus pas thal mo sbyar nas// tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan
gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'ad// gang zhig 'dzan par brgyad pa na// byang chub gnas skabs gnas pa na// dga' ldan lhar na skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag cag rab dga' nas/
lha yi rnam smin mchog spus nas// 'dzam glinge dag tu gnas pas ni// mdo snga 'di no slogs pa ra bgyid/ de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa
tshangs pa lha'argyal po gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bsam gtan rnams dang thog rnams dang/ rnam thar tshad med thams cad kyang/ mdo sde 'di las
byung bas na// de slad mdo sde 'ad rab gsungs// mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas/ tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas// mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slad// rtag par yongs su srung skyob
bgyidi// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshod dang na zhes bya bas/ yang gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mdo// bdung spyod rjes sum 'bad
zhing/ bdud kyi lam ngan spyod brgyud pa// 'di na gang zhig 'dzin bgyid na// bdag kyang mdo sde 'di la ni// brtson pa dag ga rab bsrungs nas// brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed de//
kun tu rgya cher spel bar bgyid// de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gang zhage mdo sde 'di bzung nas// nyen mengs rnams na pham bgyid pa//
de 'dra'i sems can de dag la// srung skyob bde la 'god par bgyid// mdo sde 'di ni gang 'chad pa// bdud rnams kyisan glags ma rnyed/ bcom ldan byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus//
bdag gis de la srung bar bgyur// de nas lha'i bu bkra shis dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub mchog/ mdo sde 'di
las ston pas na/ de gang gi mdo sde 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur/bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas// bye ba'i lha la rab thashad nas// gus par
nyan par brgyud pa dag/ byang chub gnas su skul bar bgyid// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// byang chub la na'i
gnas nas// gsol ba ma btab grogs mthong na// lus srog dag kyang rab spangs nas/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di srung bgyis// 'di 'dra'i chos ni bangag thos nas// dga' ldan lha
gnas mchis nas kyang// dam ldan byin rlabs dbang gis na// lha ma rgya chen ston par bgyid// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gus pas sbrul mo sbyar nas// tshigs su
bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan nyan thos theg par na/ bdagunanga shes rab chung par gsungs/ 'deng bdag rang gi stobs kyi mithus/ mdo sde bad na srung 'dzin bgyid// gang zhig
mdo 'di 'dzin bgyid na// bdag gis de ni rab bzung ste// tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu sA lanas// rjes 'brang rtag par rigs zhes brjod// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal/
mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du// mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang// chos mchog rgyal po 'di 'dra ba/ nams
kyang thos par yong ma gyur// deng bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las// mngon thos yongs su bzung bas na/ gang dag byang chub mos pa la/ rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgyid// de nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ lha dang mi'i 'khor ming bo de dag so so nas mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel zhing/ yongs su skyab pa dang/ yongs su bsrung bar
sams bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par bskul te/ sems can la rgyu char phan 'dogs par gzigs pa dang/ legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa
brjod nas/ khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyul po mchog dam pa 'di sems rtsa gcig tu rgya cher spel nas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang 'thor zhung da
nub par ma gyur par byed pa de na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa yin pas/ bsod nams ji snyed cig 'thob par 'gyur ba na/ bskal pa gtsub klung ga bye ma snyed du brjod
! myong mazlar thug par mi 'gyur ro// dag slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la sog
ba gang la la zhig mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ ya gir bros te rgya cher spel ba dad gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed pas/ theb pa'i bsod nams gang yin/
pa de yang de bzhin no// de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang yod dag pa'i brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// de nas tshad med mah+pha' med pa'i gang+ga'i klung gi byu ma
dngamanyam pa'i 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas yang dag
par blangs nas/ bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig go/
'phags pa gsor 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi mkhan
po dang/ lo tsA ba bcom ldan 'das kyi rang lugs pa ban+do chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du//
pany+tsa ta thA ga ta mang+ga laM ga thA/ bod skad du/ debazhi gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs suM bcang// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes/
dam pa mtshon ldan/ d+hAzla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa' mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yon ga/
bkra shas de sa ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gdA mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad bkra shis
bkra shas pa/ dag mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ 3ma yos rab tu sgrims te gdon// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i
sras kyi mtshan 'do ma lus par/ lha la gus bzhin nyin gcig bzhin du nang par su brjod pa// de dag sems can dmyal ba'i dang bral zhi zhing
bde ba dang// dpal dang ldan zhing nad kun choms pa nor dang ldan par 'gyur// bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
mar
